alert.note: Alert for Edmonson; Grayson; Hardin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 4:32PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Nelson, Larue, Hart, eastern Grayson, Hardin, north central Barren and northern Edmonson Counties through 515 PM EDT/415 PM CDT/... At 432 PM EDT/332 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Elizabethtown to 8 miles north of Brownsville. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Elizabethtown around 435 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Hodgenville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Louisville.
